no.permission: You are not authorized to use this command.
simon.not.allowed: You cannot become {darkblue}Simon{orange} at the moment.
lr.started.rebel: {purple}{0}{orange} chose to become a {lightred}Rebel{orange}, KILL him!
lr.preparing: {purple}{0}{orange} chose {yellow}{1}{orange}. The duel will start in {grey}{2} seconds{orange}.
lr.countdown:
The duel starts in {0} in {1} seconds!
against: {2}
lr.cannot.start: The duel cannot be started at the moment.
lr.ended: The duel has ended. Congratulations to {purple}{0}{orange} ({grey}{1} wins{orange}) for the {lime}victory{orange}!
lr.active: You cannot use this command during {yellow}Last Request{orange}!
special_day.no_permission: You do not have permission to use this command! Only {darkblue}Simon{orange} or Admin!
sd.countdown: <font color='red'>{0}</font> will start in <font color='grey'>{1} seconds</font>
special_day.cooldown: You must wait {grey}{0} rounds{orange} before using the command for {yellow}Special Day{orange}.
cannot.color.rebel: You cannot color {purple}{0}{orange} because they are a {lightred}Rebel{orange}!
need.to.be.rebel: You must become a {lightred}Rebel{orange} to use this command!
rebel.cant.lr: You cannot use {bluegrey}!lr{orange} as a {lightred}Rebel{orange}, ask {darkblue}Simon{orange} to pardon you ({bluegrey}!pardon{orange})!
player.is.t: You cannot choose a {yellow}prisoner{orange} to become {darkblue}Simon{orange}!
simon.death: {darkblue}Simon{orange} was killed by {purple}{0}{orange}, type {bluegrey}!s{orange} to become the new {darkblue}Simon{orange} or one will be randomly chosen among {blue}Guardians{orange}!
simon.death.deputy.selected: {darkblue}Simon{orange} died, {darkblue}Deputy{orange} {purple}{0}{orange} has taken on the role of {darkblue}Simon{orange}!
player.ctbanned: Admin {0} has given CTBan to {1} for {2} [Reason: ({3})]
ctban.message: You are currently CTBanned. Try again later.
require.ct: You must be on the {blue}Guardians{orange} team to use this command.
no.simon: There is no {darkblue}Simon{orange} available to request {lime}Heal{orange}.
no.simon.forgivness: There is no {darkblue}Simon{orange} to ask for forgiveness.
heal.limit.reached: You have reached the maximum limit for {lime}Heal{orange} in this round!
simon.accepted.forgivness: {darkblue}Simon{orange} accepted {purple}{1}{orange}'s request to forgo being a {lightred}Rebel{orange}!
simon.refused.forgivness: {darkblue}Simon{orange} refused {purple}{1}{orange}'s request to forgo being a {lightred}Rebel{orange}!
need.to.be.t: You must be on the {yellow}prisoners{orange} team to use this command!
t.muted: All {yellow}prisoners{orange} have been muted until the end of the round.
simon.disconnected: {darkblue}Simon{orange} has left the game! Type {bluegrey}!s{orange} to become the new {purple}Simon{orange}.
player.not.found: No player with that name was found.
more.than.one.match: More than one player was found matching that pattern.
box.started: {olive}The Box{orange} has started, all {yellow}prisoners{orange} can hurt each other!
box.ended: {olive}The Box{orange} has ended, {yellow}prisoners{orange} can no longer hurt each other!
must.be.t: You must be a {yellow}prisoner{orange} to enter the {olive}waiting room{orange}!
vip.queue: You are a {darkred}VIP{orange} player! You will automatically be added to the front of the {olive}waiting room{orange}!
queue.added: You are in the {olive}waiting room{orange}! Use the command {bluegrey}!qlist{orange} to see your position.
queue.aleardy.in: You are already in the {olive}waiting room{orange}!
hp.full: Your {lime}HP{orange} is {lightred}Full{orange}, you cannot give yourself {lime}Heal{orange}.
simon.required: There must be a {darkblue}Simon{orange} to choose a {darkblue}Deputy{orange}.
simon.cant.deputy: You cannot become {darkblue}Deputy{orange} if you are {darkblue}Simon{orange}.
not.simon.using.command: You must be {darkblue}Simon{orange} to use this command!
not.simon.or.deputy.using.command: You must be {darkblue}Simon{orange} or {darkblue}Deputy{orange} to use this command!
simon.gaveup: {purple}{0}{orange} gave up on {darkblue}Simon{orange}, type {bluegrey}!s{orange} to take his place!
deputy.gaveup: {purple}{0}{orange} gave up on {darkblue}Deputy{orange}, type {bluegrey}!deputy{orange} to take his place!
bunnyhoop_disabled: {olive}BunnyHoop{orange} is {red}disabled{orange}, you can use it in {grey}{0} seconds{orange}.
bunnyhoop_disabled_center: <font color='blue'>BunnyHoop</font> is <font color='red'>disabled</font>, you can use it in <font color='grey'>{0} seconds</font>.
start.lr.question: Start a Duel?
